name: trigdroid-frida-hooks
description: TypeScript Frida hooks for TrigDroid Android security testing framework

scripts.build: tsc && frida-compile dist/main.js -o dist/main_bundle.js && npm run copy-to-package
scripts.build:bypass: tsc -p tsconfig.bypass.json && frida-compile dist/trigdroid_bypass_rpc.js -o dist/trigdroid_bypass_bundle.js && npm run copy-to-package
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:bypass
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build:all

author: TrigDroid Team
